In the history of the Olympic games, no athlete has been more dominant than Michael Phelps...
Being able to represent your country and wear the stars and stripes...
...is something that I'm happy and had the privilege to do.
A powerful force in the pool with an arm span of over six and a half feet,...
If I want to achieve something, nothing is going to stand in my way, nothing.
Michael Phelps, the man they call the "Baltimore Bullet" is ready to blow the competition away.
